ComicInfo.Summary: World War Hulk II Part IV: The Black Panther deploys nanbots which help Amadeus regain dominance over his Hulk persona. Merging his Hulk side into himself, Amadeus surrenders to the heroes. After three months in jail, Amadeus is released and apologizes to his friends.
ComicInfo.Title: World War Hulk II Part IV
